text: The 2015 ISU World Team Trophy was an international team figure skating competition in the 2014–15 season. Participating countries selected two men's single skaters, two ladies' single skaters, one pair and one ice dancing entry to compete in a team format with points based on the skaters' placement. ==Entries== {| class="wikitable" !
